sentence.Network_en: A trombonist could pick up a scholarship by joining the University of Texas band.
sentence.Network_cn: 长号手在加入得克萨斯大学乐队时也可以获得一份奖学金.

entry.def: A trombonist is someone who plays the trombone.

means.word_mean: 1. a musician who plays the trombone

auth_sentence.content: Trombonist Jimmy Knepper was another regular associate.
